head.title: New York Outlet For Patrick's Show

hedline.hl1: New York Outlet For Patrick's Show

block.p: ESPN Radio, which has had no New York outlet for its daytime sports-talk programs, yesterday placed the show that features Dan Patrick, the top SportsCenter anchor, on WEVD-AM/1050, weekdays from 1-4 p.m. WEVD will start carrying the program July 31.

ESPN Radio, which has had no New York outlet for its daytime sports-talk programs, yesterday placed the show that features Dan Patrick, the top SportsCenter anchor, on WEVD-AM/1050, weekdays from 1-4 p.m. WEVD will start carrying the program July 31.

Patrick, who cut back his SportsCenter work last September to start the program, said, ''We can't out-local 'Mike and the Mad Dog,' so we have to go at the market from different angles.'' Patrick and his partner, Rob Dibble, will compete with WFAN's Mike Francesa and Chris Russo, who are on the air from 1-7 p.m.
